featuresTurnstile.backText: SUS304 stainless steel was used to design the durable housing.
Panic hardware. During emergency situation and power outages, the turnstile bars are lowered to allow people to leave the area quickly and safely.

featuresScaner.backText: Alaqan does not require surface contact. Technology prevents the spread of diseases.
Scanning of the veins of the palm is fast - in 0.3 seconds.
The probability that you will be mistaken for another person is ~0.0001%. The probability of recognition error is ~0.068%.
Biometrics are not stored anywhere. The vein pattern is encrypted into a code without the risk of data leakage.
